container.name: Cli
container.sql: insert into j_cli(id, name, ip, heartbeat, usr) values (?,?,?,now(),?)
select id from j_cli where name=? and usr=?
update j_cli set heartbeat=now() where id=?
select id, name, ip, heartbeat, ctime, extract(epoch from (now()-heartbeat))>? as expired from j_cli where usr=? order by ctime desc
select id, name, ip, heartbeat, ctime from j_cli where usr=? and extract(epoch from (now()-heartbeat))<?
select count(id) as c from j_cli where usr=?
